string.text: {?DAYS}You've been a captive {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a captive {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}

{?DAYS}You've been a prisoner at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a prisoner at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
Waiting in captivity...
